TopicTitle: Location PINS not showing in flight map view

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

Can I get some help:

I started playing KSP again on 1.0.4 after not playing for a while. 

When I accept a new contract and go to the tracking station, I can see the location pins of the missions visible on Kerbin surface.

But the pins are not showing at all when I am in flight and switch to map view to look for them.

So there are visible from the tracking station, but not during a flight...

Is it a bug? or is it new in ksp? 

Thanks
